text.――もしもしママ？\\n久しぶりね、元気？\\n\\n――こっち？ ランチを終え:
— Mom? Hi! It's been a while, how are you? 
— Me? I just finished lunch with Chev and Viv. 
— As usual, Cheval's was all brown and Vivlos 
won't eat anything she doesn't find interesting. 
Really, what am I to do with these two! 
— Oh, but don't worry. I made sure they got their veggies 
and rice. I can get Viv with rewards as always, and Chev… 
I just have to chase her and feed her myself, y'know? 
— Heheh. Aw, it's no problem at all. 
I'm totally used to it. Besides… 
— You know how it is, mama. I love looking after these two.
text.「――悲鳴を上げそうになる心が奮い立つ。\\n最終コーナーを抜ける直前のロイスの:
"—— Her racing heart skips a beat as if responding in joy. 
Right at the final corner's exit, Royce's ears picked up 
the voices of those dear to her with certainty." 

(I can see the image floating in Royce's mind clear as day… 
it tells me this is where I accompany her in pianissimo… 
a vital respite before the climax) 

"«Go for it, Royce!», they shout. 
Hesitation no longer inhabited Royce's heart." 

(Thus we enter the bridge! Just what I was waiting on! 
Playing the main theme in slow tempo! Grandioso!) 

"The sounds of feet digging into the earth. 
A moment later, the packed crowd witnesses 
a streak of light traversing the straight ——" 

"… Perfect! The climax had the ubiquitous strength 
I imagined to it… one of classic youthful passion, 
awakened by the bonds woven up to that point… 
And Earth… you provided the most 
wonderful sonic backdrop to it!" 

"You flatter, the notes stirred my soul 
and I simply had to join in! 
A lovely melody was the natural result. 
It is I who wishes to offer thanks, Ms. Royce!"
text.大地は見ていた。\\n原初の存在が、\\n氷と炎の一滴から生まれたことを。\\n:
The land looked on. As from a single drop 
of ice and fire was born a primal being. 
Twilight fell, as gods repeated their cycle of prosperity 
and conflict in the shade of the grand tree. 
In time, the world, on its way to ruin, welcomed a new life. 
—— Thus, once the first drop is poured, its fate must be 
seen through all the way. Its cup polished until the end. 
In so doing, a brand new blessing 
will bring about its reincarnation. 

"Amazing…! So shiny! I need to put in 
the effort to polish myself up as well!" 

"… Heh, exquisite attitude." 

Ah… our own polished fates, in turn, may see a new life.
text.「――え、夕陽じゃん。ヤバ」\\n\\n「放課後ってマッハじゃね？\\n放課後ま:
"Whoa, the sun's setting. Crap." 
"School takes sooo long and then it's like 
after school time just disappears into 
a black hole or something!? Weird, right?"  

"Huh? Wha? General rela… relati… vity, relativity?" 
"Wha!? Classtime dilation? That's a real thing!? 
That sounds lame as heck!"  

"…… Oh, so that's why time flies 
when we're running or chatting." 
"I get it now～ Huh……"  

"Well, I guess we just gotta run and chat 
like crazy to make up for it! 
So like, let's hang out a bit longer, yea?♪"
text.「あのっ、えっと！\\nヤエノさん、ファンです！\\nいつもつよくて、カッコよく:
"Umm…! Miss Yaeno! I'm a big fan! 
I love how strong and cool you are…!" 
 
"W-Who's this cute little— AHEM. 
Thank you very much for cheering me on." 
(Oh no, she was so cute I lost control of my face 
for a moment… I must keep it together!) 
 
"— 'T brings me immense pleasure to hear! 
I shall continue to devote myself to this path! Aye!" 
(This little girl earnestly called me cool…! 
I must live up to her admiration… !! At all cost!!!!) 
 
"Wow! That's so cool! 
'Brings me im-ense pleysure! Aye! 
Mommy, do I sound like Miss Yaeno?" 
 
"Oh this girl… Heheh, she's always doing this 
at home, pretending to be you." 
 
"……! Ack… uff… so adorablhnnngg……!" 
"'Tis an honor! Aye!!"
text.「ミラ子先輩、\\n保湿クリームの準備できました～」\\n\\n「さすがはダンツ:
"Mirako! I brought that moisturizing cream～" 
"I knew I could count on you, Dantsu! 
Let's get started then, we're going to get all 
moisturized and have super soft skin!" 
"Wooh!" 
 
"… So, where do we start from again～?" 
"We should start with our calves first… keep in mind 
you want to get it nicely seeped into your skin. 
Hm-hmm hmm～ Rubby rub～" 
 
"Whoah～ looks like it requires quite a bit of power, 
doesn't it? I can see myself skipping it 
when I'm tired already…" 
"It's especially important when you're tired! 
Getting in shape and skin care are both things 
that need constant working on!" 
 
"Ooh, wise words. I'm going to give it 
my best shot too～ Mmmh～～～ 
"That's it, you got it! Just keep going! 
It's on to smooth skin for both of us♪"
text.『本日の野球観戦、お疲れ様でした』\\n\\n＞お疲れさま！すっごく楽しかったよ:
"Thank you for joining me at the baseball game today." 
> No problem! It was great fun! 
> (Thanks! sticker) 
"I'm glad you had a good time." 
"I might have behaved a tad immodestly at one point, 
but that was only because the game was just so heated. 
It's not every day that you see a comeback from 6 runs 
behind in the bottom of the 9th inning!" 
"Not that I would know, mind, it's just the gentleman 
in a nearby seat was saying so." 
"That runner's do-or-die base steal to tie the game, 
followed by a safety squeeze were particularly thrilling. 
To are such a play in professional baseball, and have 
the skils to pull it off. Remarkable!" 
> I see, that was really interesting, yeah! 
> (I'm learning! sticker) 
= 5 minutes later… 
"I apologize for the long messages earlier. 
In any case, it was incredibly worthwhile." 
"Should another opportunity arise, we should definitely 
go again. I honestly am not very knowledgeable on 
the topic, but I will accompany you if you wish." 
"[Team Victories da best! sticker]"
text.ターフと言う名の五線譜に\\n刻まれていく蹄跡【メロディー】。\\n\\n「ふふ:
A [Melody] written in hoofprints 
on the staff named "turf". 
"Hahah… the esultazione within 
this race is without doubt!" 
This was what she longed for. 
This was what she adored. 
Obbligato? Accompagnamento? 
— Her part matters not. 
"Join me! Our session commences!" 
There is but joy to be found 
in the arrangement of hoofmarks!
text.今夜は『メジロ・クリスマス・ナイト』……\\nあたしを含めたメジロのウマ娘が、\:
Tonight is the "Mejiro's Christmas Night"… 
A special event on a special night, held by the Mejiro 
horsegirls for their unfailingly supportive fans. 
"W-welcome to the Mejiro's Christmas Night! 
Please check in over here!" 
"Huh… you want a picture with me…!? 
…… O-Okay, I can do that……… C-Cheese!" 
That's why Dober, always so tense around others, was 
mustering all her courage to interact with the guests. 
"You're doing great, Dober… Your buccinator is still 
looking tight, but you're welcoming guests magnificently!" 
When I first started secretly looking out for her, I was 
worried she might be having a tough time… but it seems 
that there we no need for me to leave my post…… 
"Oh, what a wonderful night… to be given 
such a present by the Mejiros this year…" 
"… We all put a lot of effort into tonight, hoping that 
everyone would enjoy a wonderful christmas. It would 
make us all very pleased if you came away with some 
great memories." 
Even with ladies she has never met, she manages to 
converse in her own words, without drawing back. 
…… Before long, my zygomaticus major had relaxed 
quite a bit. That's right. Dober had always been like this. 
She always puts a brave step forwards when acting 
for someone, when helping others. 
She's a kind girl like that. 
"… Do your best, Dober!"
text.「ラモーヌ様。昼食の用意が整いました。\\n……ラモーヌ様？」\\n\\n……ノ:
"Ms. Ramonu. Lunch has been served. ……Ms. Ramonu?" 
…… No response to my knocking either. 
Fully aware of my ill manner, I opened the door 
to the lounge. Ms. Ramonu was painting. 
It was an image I could not understand —— 
An abstract painting beyond the comprehension of others. 
I had heard about this from another maid. 
There had been a time when Ms. Ramonu's legs were weak, 
and she didn't partake in training during the winter. 
She had spent that time painting abstract images. 
Her fervor, her adulation, her passion, her melancholy —— 
She threw them all at the canvas. Her art, much like herself, 
was imbued with indescribable beauty. 
But why, why has she, at this point, taken up 
her brush once again? 
"… It falls far short of those times. But of course. 
These days, I can come face to face with my love." 
…… My breath was taken away even though I couldn't 
make sense of her words. Without knowing what had 
overcome her, I simply kept gazing at her beauty. 
"The snow has ceased. Let us talk of love.", I heard 
her murmur as I quietly vacated the room. 
…… All that would remain of our meeting was the work 
I hadn't finished, and the white canvas upon which 
she had painted the lushest of greenery.
text.クリスマスも間近の、ある日のこと――\\n\\n「う～ん、これだけ品揃えがあると:
On a certain day nearing Christmas —— 
"Mmm, it's tough to decide when faced with 
such a large variety of choices～" 
"Indeed… Ryan would likely be happy with 
anything, but… it's always nicer to find something 
that she would truly enjoy, isn't it?" 
"What do you think about horseshoes～? 
My dear sister Ryan patiently accompanied me 
in selecting a pair in the past～" 
"Therefore, I would like to take some time to carefully 
pick out a pair of horseshoes for her this time." 
"I see. So she waited patiently for Bright to decide which 
ones she wanted… Hehe, that's so like Ryan." 
"… I remember, when I was little, she held my hand on 
a stormy night full of thunder. Even though she disliked 
staying up late, she stayed with me the whole night…… 
I always thought I couldn't compare to that." 
"What'd be a good way to repay her… maybe something 
for good sleep? But I'm pretty sure she sleeps well as is…" 
"The store will be closing in 30 minutes. 
We look forward to you next visit." 
"Whoah, it's that time already?!" 
…… Uhhh, What do I do… I'm having a harder 
time picking something than I expected…" 
"That's perfectly fine, Dober. 
You must take your time in expressing gratitude, 
otherwise your feelings might not reach～" 
"…… Heh. Bright could be very right. 
Well, let's come look around more tomorrow then."
text.ヴィブロスが駆けだす。\\n記者たちはもっと話を聞きたいと思ったが、\\n彼女が:
Vivlos sets off running. 
The media folk gathered were not done 
asking questions, but quickly realizing 
she could not stand motionless in this moment, 
a wry smile simply formed on their faces. 
Though she must be incredibly tired, the reason 
her steps were light as a feather nonetheless 
could be seen at the end of her gaze. 

"Heey, siiiis～～～! First! 
I came first! I really did it!" 

There was Verxina, meeting her guileless little sister 
running straight at her, no eye for anything else, 
with open arms and an emotional expression. 

"Vivlos… thank you…! 
You ran an incredible, fantastic final leg. 
Those 7cm I couldn't close… 
The things I couldn't see behind them… 
You revealed them to me today." 

"Ehehe～ I have a second stomach for compliments～～♪" 

"… While I still thought of you as my cute, 
needy little sister, somewhere along you've 
become so strong." 

"Well my older sister's well known for her spirit, 
so of course I'll win if I set my thoughts on it! 
Ah, but even so, I'll always be a cute little sister♡" 

"Hahahah, I guess so. I'd love to see you 
being cute and strong out there." 

"Yeah! I'm gonna go win a lot! 
In huge races, or against powerful opponents! 
And I'll always come back for your compliments♪ 
What do you think? Deal?♡"
text.『ドゥラメンテ、外に大きく膨らんだ！\\nこれは手痛いミスっ！！』\\n\\n風:
"Duramente drifts far to the outside! 
A mistake likely to cost her dear!!" 

I can hear the roars of the crowd between 
that of the wind rushing past my ears. 
I feel removed from my body, like it is not my own. 

(Have I lost my composure…?!) 

No, it's not that. It's not nerves sending shivers 
through me, but something deep inside, an urge —— 

"Haaaaaaaaaaah!!" 

"Duramente from the outside! Can you believe it, 
Duramente has found a way from the outside!!" 

That's right… it's the urge in my blood, the pride 
within its line. It stimulates me, encouraging, 
emboldening, to prove that I am the "strongest". 

"Is this what she is capable of!? Duramente!!"
text.花手水。\\n春の芽吹きはまだ遠い新年を、\\n鮮やかに彩る花々。\\nその美し:
Hanachōzu; floating flowers in a Shinto ablution basin. 
Spectacular colors adorning a new year still far 
from springtime's blossoming buds. 
Both of us momentarily taken by their beauty. 
Our wishes are like buds waiting to open — those were 
the words softly leaving your lips. To let them bloom. 

For each of the numerous flowers laying within 
the basin, so too a wish lay within me. 
Plip-plop, plip-plop. One by one, droplets fell 
underneath this branch of the Satono tree, 
drawing expanding rings upon the water's surface. 
I am reminded of drops from days past, drops which 
followed the curves of my cheeks. 
The pile of unflowering flowers. 

I'll let them blossom this time, on the most 
floriferous once in a lifetime stage. 
I'll let these flowers — these wishes — reach full bloom, 
like this beautiful hanachōzu. 

"Yeah. We'll have them blooming, without fail." 
You nodded your head, with a smile as warm as 
the sunlight stretching over the buds.
text.ウマ娘――\\n時に数奇で、時に輝かしい歴史を持つ\\n別世界の名を背負い、その:
Horsegirls — born to run, they take on names 
of another world, succeeding their corresponding spirit 
and accompanying histories, both brilliant and tragic. 
Through their many races, these girls eventually 
become part of history themselves.  

"I'll be Japan's number one horsegirl!" 
She makes this vow to her two mothers. Harboring her 
ambition to be "Japan's number one", a girl leaving behind 
her hometown encounters rivals, competes with them 
in races, and through her victories and defeats eventually 
turns that dream of hers into reality.  

"I'll win regardless." 
A "sovereign" chasing after the "emperor". 
Spurred by an unyielding spirit, she fought through 
repeated setbacks to accomplish miracles in front of 
the friends who always ran by her side and the rival 
who supported her all the way.  

"Everyone said they want to see me run…" 
A young girl in awe of the unbreakable "sovereign". 
Together with her bosom friend with whom she exchanged 
a promise, she jumped into the world of racing. 
Though beset by doubt in her own dream, she managed 
to find herself, becoming a festival girl beloved by all.  

All said —— 
"Ah, over here, Spe!" 
"Wooh, made it～! My battle meal was 
more delicious than I anticipated…" 
"Geez～ The race is about to start! 
—— Ah, I know! Why don't we race to the paddock? 
We can establish which one of us is number one♪" 
"Oh, that sounds fun! Wanna have a go at it, Spe?" 
"Of course! I might have arrived last, 
but I'm gonna finish first～!" 
"Okaay, get ready… go!!" 
The road they travel has not yet reached its end.
text.目に入るのは、まばゆい光。\\nよく知る故郷の会場に、\\n見知った人々の顔。\:
The reflection in her eyes is that of a bright light. 
The familiar faces at the familiar assembly hall 
in her hometown.  

"You've gotten so good at singing and dancing…! 
It's no wonder you're the face of our town!" 
"For sure, thanks to her we see bunches of tourists 
passing through. She's our hope and our pride!"  

A tingle spreads through her eyes at the kind words 
and smiles around her. She can't help it. 
For that once dim light was now sparkling brightly, 
surrounded by great wide smiles.  

"This is the last one! Titled ——" 
"'Come with me, Tomakomai!'"  

No matter how much mud she's covered in, or how many 
times she stumbles, she'll always keep running. 
To protect the place she holds dear, the place she 
never wants to lose, with her own two legs.
text.ユキちゃんのお部屋から、\\n故郷のお菓子のレシピが見つかったみたい。\\n『久:
Yuki seems to have found a recipe for one of 
her hometown's sweets in her room. 
When she said "It's been a while since I made these～", 
I asked if I could join her to watch, and — wow, she's really 
good at this! Quick, deft, and amazingly attentive!!  

"Amazing!! So pinching them just right 
at the end is an important step!!" 
"You're really good at this, Yuki! Even getting all 
those little details perfect! It's really amaaaazing!!"  

"O-Oh please, Ticket, you're exaggerating a bit～" 
"But… thanks. It makes it real happy to hear♪ 
Alriiight, I'm gonne give it one more push～!"  

She seems to really enjoy making sweets! 
Looking at her makes me want to do it myself too. 
I think there's a headscarf and apron in my locker… 
Right, let's make some sweets!! 
Just need to figure out which ones…  

"Ah, I know!" 
With an idea in mind, I got to work. 
I think this is going pretty well!? 
"The ears go… there!! And then, place little 
bits of red bean paste… veeery caaaarefully…"  

"It's doooooooone!!!!" 
"Oooh, what a charming lil' thing～♪ 
The smile makes it look real sweet."  

"Ehehe～! That's because it's you!! 
You looked so happy making sweets it made me want 
to try too, and so I thought I should make one of you!"  

"Huh!? You mean this cutie is supposed to be me!? 
… Ooh. I feel so happy." 
"Yeah, that expression! It's the exact same!!" 
"Ehehe…… Ticket, seeing your expression right now 
makes me want to make one of you too. Is that okay? 
"Y-Yuuukiiiiiiii!! Of course it's okaaaaaaaay!!"
text.ごあいさつ\\n\\nみんなの学級委員長として、\\n日頃の感謝を:
[Introduction] 
As everyone's trusted class president, I have taken it 
upon me to pack my feelings of gratitude into confections!! 
A beautiful feeling it is, gratitude! 
And what more could bring to mind beauty 
than the sakura cherry trees!! 
Therefore, I have made these confections 
in the shape of the sakura's petals! 
And the results are beautiful indeed! 
It is beauty x beauty, after all!! 
—— Sakura Bakushin O  

Though gratitude is but a single word, I believe 
it comes in many shapes and sizes. 
I have thus adapted Bakushin O's idea of wanting to make 
confections in the sakura's petal shape similarly. 
Five pieces represent the lovely petals. 
Five colors represent the varied forms of gratitude. 
Please enjoy them from the moment you open the box♪ 
—— North Flight  

[Menu/Contents] 
1. Gratitude to vitality. 
A crunchy cookie! 
The bright yellow color gives you energy!  

2. Gratitude to kindness. 
Deliciously sweet mochi cake! 
Let its cute pink color warm your heart!  

3. Gratitude to smiling. 
A soft and fluffy dango! 
A white as pure as a friendly smile for infectious laughter!  

4. Gratitude to discipline. 
A slightly tough thin, baked okaki mochi slice! 
A gentle sweetness slowly spreads in your mouth!  

5. Gratitude to dreams. 
A glittering gold leaf yokan! 
Towards a greater, sparkling future together!
text.「ふぅん、ヴィンテージ風のジャケット？\\n……あら、このブランド！\\nへえ、:
"Hmm, a vintage-style jacket? …Oh, I know this brand! 
Hmm, I wasn't aware they made things like this now! 
Their high class aura is fantastic. 
I remember talking about it to my mother… uhh, ahem. 
Thank you very much, Ms. Flight. 
You managed to bring out a whole new side while 
still matching my majesty with great style. 
… Truly the work of a fashionista!"  

"Wowie, street style! An oversized hoodie 
with short pants, and playful platform sneakers… 
Hehehe, just talking about it makes me 
want to head out already♪ 
Hit up a popular spot and show off～! 
Why don't we have a little Umasta Live 
together when I do, Flight?"  

"Whoa… can't you only get these accessories 
in some concept shops? You really get around, Flight. 
We should swap info again some time, I've got 
info about the newest items to share. 
… But for real, mad props to your research."  

You, and you. And of course, me! 
We're all unpolished gems, with our 
glittering potential hidden. 
I want to polish these gems, to show their beauty! 
Nothing makes me happier than accomplishing that. 
Come to me, my pretty new gemmie! 
Let's find a way to make you shine!
text.さて、此度私と矛を交えてくださるのは\\nどのような方々かしら――？\\n\\n:
Allow me to ascertain with whom I shall have 
the pleasure of competing this time —— 
 
"I am extending to you the privilege to witness 
my gold-clad supremacy up close." 
 
"It's gonna be tons of fun, ya know? 
Blasting past all these faces and straight 
to the top, I mean!" 
 
"I can't complain about competition like you. 
Worthy opponents against which to prove 
my overwhelming strength and lineage…" 
 
"I'm gonna win! I will… carve a path 
to the Tiara with my victory!" 
 
My, how wonderful. Each of these lovely ladies 
sparkling like a diamond, and just as tough… 
"—— All the more reason to shatter them."
text.――玉盃を浴びよ。\\n\\n君臨せしは激情の覇王。\\nターフの頂点にて、遍く:
Bathe in the splendor of her goblet. 
An impassioned sovereign reigns supreme. 
From the turf's summit, trampling all before her. 
Her supremacy a beautiful art. 
Her course a raging storm. 
The whole world enveloped in her richest gold. 
Surrender, worship, kneel down. 
For we can only live in awe of her nobility.
text.伝えたい情熱がある。\\n届けたい感動がある。\\n\\nだから私は、今日も探す:
She has a passion that she wishes to share. 
She has emotions that she wishes to convey. 
That's why I am searching every day. 
For the stages on which her dreams 
shine their brightest. 
For the moments in which her spirit 
sparkles with luminous purity. 
 
"What do you think, Ryouka? 
Can you feel my roaring spirit!?" 
 
"Definitely, you're looking great, Elfie. 
The camera does nothing to diminish your enthusiasm!" 
"Alright, let's roll with this take. Good work, Elfie!" 
 
"Woohoo! Thanks!" 
"Ehehe～ I hope everyone enjoys our new video!" 
 
"Don't worry. I'm sure they will." 
 
After all, you're shining like a star. Your brilliant 
light never-ending, imparting a certain strength 
to the many people watching. 
 
And… to have that light reach every corner and 
bring out the very best in you, that is is my job. 
 
"Oh yeah, Ryouka! 
I'd like to ask you something about our next project 
once we're done here, if you don't mind ——" 
 
"Oh, really? Well why don't we have a brief chat 
about it right now then? We finished the shoot 
with no issues anyway." 
 
"O-Okay! It's all about being quick and logical, huh!" 
 
"Heheh…… I guess so." 
 
It's time again, today. 
Time to create memorable entertainment. 
—— With the best partner I could ask for.
text.手を繋いで。\\n夢の始まりに胸を躍らせて。\\n一緒にその門をくぐった。\\n:
They stood hand in hand. 
Excited at the prospect of their dream. 
Together they pushed open its gates. 
 
"I'll get there! I'll be just like the mighty Teio! 
Just you wait and see!" 
"I'll be the sparkle of the Satono family! 
Just like McQueen sparkled!" 
 
The things they admired shaped their dreams. 
Their many encounters gave color to their futures. 
A world of their own spread out infinitely before them —— 
 
"I'm taking one step ahead, Dia!" 
"Yeah. I'll chase you… and definitely catch up." 
 
Their path diverged, each following their own. 
Only to cross again, and the two to clash. 
 
"Dia… I've waited so long for this day to come!" 
"Me too. But… I'll be victorious and surpass you." 
"Come and try!" 
 
—— It's time for them to let go of each other's hand. 
To reach out for a radiance only one can grasp!
text.彼女は“最強”を求める。\\n9か月というブランクを強いられても、\\nその血を:
The pinnacle is what she seeks. 
Disregarding nine months of forced absence 
to carve her bloodline further into the pages of history. 
 
"I'll provide proof — that I am 
irrefutably the strongest in history." 
 
Glory is what she seeks. 
Stamping the Satono family's mark on her achievements 
to live up to the expectations of her lineage. 
 
"Even if I'm never the favorite, I won't give in until 
I claim victory — watch me overcome adversity!" 
 
When they seek the same "ideal", it is inevitable 
they meet in races, competing for glory. 
 
"I'll bring you to your knees!" 
"I'll show you my perfect plan!" 
 
They choose to run, each holding 
their own conviction in their hearts.
text.「こうして、みんなの愛バとなったあの娘は\\n最強の一角として、いつまでも、\\:
"And thus, having become everyone's favorite 
horsegirl, she became known as the greatest 
there was, her tale passed down for all time. 
And the world was happy ever after… 
Thank you for watching Royce's Masterpiece Theatre♪" 
 
"—— Except, it's too early for that! 
Come on, follow me, Earth! We're starting the second 
chapter; the Beloved Pre-Eminent Horsegirl arc!" 
 
[Trumpet Fanfare] 
 
"Right behind you, signorina! 
Leave her entrance scene's performance to me!" 
 
[Uptempo piece] 
"Here I go, Royce!

text.輝かしい才能たちが\\nターフに煌めく世代にあって、\\n彼女の戦績には鬱屈とし:
Amongst all the bright talent in a generation who 
light up the turf, there are those wanderers who look 
despondently upon these twinkling lights. 
How much pain and hardship hides behind the 
congratulatory applause for the winners? 
Their dust-covered backs do not provide 
an answer, no way to understand. 
However… 
 
A pair of eyes watches out from under a cap pulled low. 
In them, a flame quietly flickers. In anger, in frustration. 
On the grand stage, heading to take on the world, her tiny 
blue mantle flutters in the wind. 
 
The sight of her running, as if to leave behind all her 
woes and overturn every single hope and expectation… 
it called to mind that one horsegirl who triumphed over 
the world in the past. 
 
—— Indeed, it's a near certainty that 
she will cross those great blue waters. 
And as if taking flight to the world beyond, 
leave the goalposts in her own marine blue.
text.――路を辿って、ここまで来た。\\n\\n鋼の肉体と精神を持ち、幾多ものレースを:
Pursuing their own path they made it this far. 
 
The Woman of Steel, as like steel her will 
and body were, who concluded countless 
races entirely unharmed. 
 
The fair lady who faced her responsibilities under 
her noble bloodline, and found her own path 
at their end. 
 
The beast bordering on "Monster", who strung together 
six consecutive graded victories, unfaltering and unfazed 
by any opponent. 
 
The Empress, who, treading in the queen's footsteps, 
not only lit up the path to the tiara, but seized victory at 
the Autumn Tenno Sho. 
 
The Magical Girl, who bluntly proclaimed that 
a horsegirl's strength is unrelated to any set path 
as she personally went about proving just that. 
 
They were dazzling and glorious, and endlessly fast. 
It is their honored footsteps I followed to make it 
as far as I have. 
 
And now, it is my time to be up there. 
I'm sure I can do it. 
All of my feelings will let me reach that tiara…!
text.夜のレッスン室に、白い羽が舞う。\\nこれは誰かのためのダンス。\\nやさしい想:
The lesson room at night. 
White wings flutter in a dance. 
A dance dedicated to someone. 
 
A step, each one more refined than the last. 
A step, each one beautiful beyond this world. 
A step, further and further away. 
A step, exceeding all bounds. 
 
Wings, enchanting and pristine as glass. 
Spread as if to take off towards distant skie— 
 
[CLUNK] 
 
"—— !!" 
 
"Ah…… I'm sorry. Right, it's late. 
I'll tidy up straight away." 
 
In a moment, the academy will lock for the night. 
Her apologetic expression and tender smile 
betrays a certain youthful naivety. 
In that, for some reason, I find immense peace of mind.

We were born on the same earth 
We live under the same sky 
We desire to run on the same turf 
You and I 
Though they may abate soon, 
our fates are undeniably connected 
 
You, like a spring breeze 
May you remain in its warmth 
You, like a gentle breath of air 
May you swirl through my skies forever 
 
My dear contemporary 
Our precious days 
I cherish 
Your happiness
text.“デート”の手を強く握り、中央に立つ。\\n流れてくるのは情熱の音楽。\\n鼓動:
Gripping our "date's" hand, we stand in the center. 
An impassioned energy rides the music reaching our ears. 
Our hearts beat to an intense rhythm. 
Every pair on this dance floor are our rivals. 
Yet, my biggest rival is right beside me —— 
 
"Will you keep up with me, Oguri!? 
Step, step… and step, into a turn!!" 
 
"—— !! I expected nothing less... 
but I can do that too...!" 
 
"Woaaah!! Heheh, impressive. 
I won't go down easy though!" 
 
We're not concerned with the lead and follow. 
That's nothing for the two of us. 
Our focus is only the lead, leaving us without 
a moment to breathe in its contention. 
 
This stinging sensation feels great. 
Much like the fervor of competition in a race, 
this all out battle between us... these moments 
where we face each other with all our heart... 
are irreplaceably special to me.
